about.details:
Incorporated in 2009, Mohini Health & Hygiene Ltd is Pithampur, MP based company engaged in the business of manufacturing and export of absorbent cotton and medical consumable products. Company owns in both domestic and international markets. Company's revenue from operations from domestic region is 44.77% and international market is 55.23%. Company exports its products majorly to countries such as Portland, Italy, Latvia, Russia, Spain and Greece.

Company was initially engaged in the business of dealing and processing of raw cotton, yarn and textile fabric. Company has now diversified in to health & hygiene sector.

Product Portfolio:
1. Absorbent Bleached Surgical Cotton
2. Absorbent Cotton Wool
3. Cotton Balls
4. Cotton Ear Buds
5. Cotton Zig Zag

contactDetails.full_address: Mohini Health & Hygiene Ltd, Plot no 109 Sector no 3, Industrial Area, Pithampur

faqs.question: What is the Mohini Health IPO?
faqs.answer:
Mohini Health IPO is a SME IPO of 4932000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹20.71 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹42 per share. The minimum order quantity is 3000.

The IPO opens on February 5, 2018, and closes on February 7, 2018.

Link Intime India Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Mohini Health IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Mohini Health IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Mohini Health IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Mohini Health IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Mohini Health IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Mohini Health IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Mohini Health IPO opens on February 5, 2018 and closes on February 7, 2018.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Mohini Health IPO?
faqs.answer: Mohini Health IPO lot size is 3000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,20,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Mohini Health IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Mohini Health IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Mohini Health IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Mohini Health IPO will be done on Monday, February 12, 2018, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Thursday, February 15, 2018. Check the Mohini Health IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Mohini Health IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Mohini Health IPO listing date is on Friday, February 16, 2018.
